product_name: Lowepro Toploader Zoom AW 50 Camera Case
long_description: The Lowepro Toploader Zoom AW 50 camera bag offers a weatherproof, streamlined and easy-access carrying solution for outdoor photographers who are ready to capture that once-in-a-lifetime shot. Integrated all-weather AW Cover(TM) lets you access the main compartment without exposing your gear to rain or snow; cover stows in a small front pocket when not in use. 7.8 x 6.3 x 4.3 in. interior size holds a DSLR with an attached lens (up to 17-55mm f/2.8); horizontal divider creates a separate area for an extra lens. Internal pocket holds extra memory, UV filter or spare battery. High-density closed-cell foam and soft nylon lining protect camera and accessories. Large zipper pulls are easy to grasp, even in wet and cold conditions; shoulder strap with durable D-rings and a built-in belt loop provide carrying options. Lowepro Toploader Zoom AW 50 camera case features a zippered exterior pocket that provides space for accessories. SlipLock(TM) attachment loop lets you add a compatible case, pouch or Lowepro Topload chest harness (sold separately).
short_description: The Lowepro Toploader Zoom AW 50 camera bag offers a weatherproof, streamlined and easy-access carrying solution for outdoor photographers who are ready to capture that once-in-a-lifetime shot.
